keys: cargador del programa inicial para arriba

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zagon in zaustavitev računalnika, prijava v omrežje</string>
            <string language="en">Booting up and shutting down the computer, joining the network</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oben aufladen und den Computer, das Netz 
verbinden abschaltend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Initialisant et arrêtant l'ordinateur, 
joignant le réseau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carregando acima e fechando abaixo o computador, 
juntando a rede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricando il sistema in su e chiudendo giù il 
calcolatore, unente la rete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχίζοντας επάνω και διακόπτοντας τον υπολογιστή, που 
ενώνει το δίκτυο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anudando para arriba y cerrando abajo del 
ordenador, ensamblando la red</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Navodila za zagon računalnika, zaustavitev računalnika in prijavo v omrežje.</string>
            <string language="en">Instruction on how to boot up the computer, how to shut it down and how to log into network.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zagon</string>
            <string language="en">boot up</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zaustavitev</string>
            <string language="en">shutting down</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">omrežje</string>
            <string language="en">network</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisung, in wie man herauf den Computer 
auflädt, in wie man ihn unten schließt und wie man in Netz 
protokolliert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instruction sur la façon dont initialiser
l'ordinateur, la façon le fermer et comment enregistrer dans le 
réseau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução em como carregar acima do computador,
em como fechá-lo para baixo e como registrar na rede.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzione su come caricare il sistema sul 
calcolatore, su come chiuderlo giù e come annotare nella rete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγία για το πώς να αρχίσει επάνω τον υπολογιστή, 
πώς να το κλείσει κάτω και πώς να καταγράψει στο δίκτυο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Instrucción en cómo anudar encima del 
ordenador, cómo cerrarlo abajo y cómo registrar en red.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufladung oben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abschalten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Netz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">initialisez</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arrêt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réseau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carregador acima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fechar para baixo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rede</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caricamento del sistema in su</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chiusura giù</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μπότα επάνω</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διακοπή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δίκτυο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cargador del programa inicial para arriba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el cerrar abajo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">red</string>
          </keyword>
